name: CTLineBoundsOptions
desc: Options for getting the bounds of a line of text.

items.name: static var excludeTypographicLeading: CTLineBoundsOptions
items.desc: An option to exclude typographic leading.

items.name: static var excludeTypographicShifts: CTLineBoundsOptions
items.desc: An option to ignore cross-stream shifts due to positioning, such as kerning or baseline alignment.

items.name: static var includeLanguageExtents: CTLineBoundsOptions
items.desc: An option to include additional space based on common glyph sequences for various languages.

items.name: static var useGlyphPathBounds: CTLineBoundsOptions
items.desc: An option to use glyph path bounds rather than the default typographic bounds.

items.name: static var useHangingPunctuation: CTLineBoundsOptions
items.desc: An option to enable hanging punctuation.

items.name: static var useOpticalBounds: CTLineBoundsOptions
items.desc: An option to use optical bounds.

items.name: init(rawValue: CFOptionFlags)
items.desc: Creates a line bound options enumeration with the specified raw value.
